title: Himi 440
lyrics:
6.6.6.6.8.8.
1.
‘Ē ke mou ifi mu’a
‘A e fu’u talupite;
Ke ‘ilo ‘a e pōpul
a
‘A’ene tu’umāli
e
:
He kuo hokosia ‘en
i
,
‘A e ‘Aho ‘o e Siupeli.
2.
Kuo ‘osi pe ‘a e taim
i
.
Kuo fai ‘a e feilaulau,
Kuo hū ‘a e Taula’eik
i
He potu Toputap
u
;
Kuo folofola ‘a e ‘Otua,
“ʻOku ‘atā pē ‘a e pōpul
a
.”
3.
Ko homou ngaahi ‘ap
i
Ne mole fuoloa,
‘E toe foki mai
Ko
e
fu
a
pē ‘ene ‘of
a
.
Ifi, ke taki taha ha’u
Hono tofi’a ke toe ma’u.
4.
Ifi, he kuo ngofua
Ki he kakai kotoa
‘A e me’akai ‘a e fonua,
Ke ha’u ‘o ala noa.
Ku
o
foki ‘a e mu’aki taim
i
,
Ke kai pē faka-Palatais
i
.
5.
‘A e angahala, ha’u.
Tu’u mei ho hopoat
e
.
‘Oku mau tala at
u
Ku
o
fai ho tukuange.
‘Oku ngofua ke foki mai,
‘O ma’u ‘api ‘i he lang
i
.*
